/**
 * Data Source: libphonenumber
 *
 * @see {https://raw.githubusercontent.com/googlei18n/libphonenumber/master/resources/PhoneNumberMetadata.xml}
 *
 * @copyright 2017 Google
 * @license https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Apache
 */

namespace blobfolio\phone\data;

class dataNZ extends data {

	const CODE = 'NZ';

	const PREFIX = 64;

	const REGION = 'Australia';

	const PATTERNS = array(
		'[28]\d{7,9}|[346]\d{7}|(?:508|[79]\d)\d{6,7}',
	);

	const TYPES = array(
		'24099\d{3}|(?:3[2-79]|[49][2-9]|6[235-9]|7[2-57-9])\d{6}'=>array(
			'fixed',
		),
		'2[0-28]\d{8}|2[0-27-9]\d{7}|21\d{6}'=>array(
			'mobile',
		),
		'508\d{6,7}|80\d{6,8}'=>array(
			'toll_free',
		),
		'90\d{6,7}'=>array(
			'premium_rate',
		),
		'70\d{7}'=>array(
			'personal_number',
		),
	);

	const FORMATS = array(
		'(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3',
		'(\d)(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2 $3',
		'(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3,4})'=>'$1 $2 $3',
		'(\d{2})(\d{3,4})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3',
		'(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3,5})'=>'$1 $2 $3',
	);

}
